title: Surface-designed AuNPs-based fluorescent probe for ultra-sensitive detection of oral poultry antibacterial drug furaltadone via intermolecular hydrogen bonding
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28224-28233
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04293J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
A. Sowndarya, T. Daniel Thangadurai, N. Manjubaashini, M. Pavithrakumar, K. Senthilkumar, D. Nataraj, K. Kadirvelu, K. Naveen Kalagatur
Morphology transforming and thermally stable (∼370 °C) PA@AuNPs were utilized for ultra-low detection (LoD 6.0 nM) of oral poultry antibacterial drug Furaltadone in blood serum, supported by DFT studies, and bioimaging in zebrafish.
